alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:43AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Osage County through 730 AM CDT... At 643 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Foraker, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea to dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Shidler... Elgin... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Webb City... Wah Sha She State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
